name: Space Car For Beginners
description:
We from LostFrames designed this basic game in order to teach other people in a workshop how to code in unity and to explain why you should teach unity in school.

This game allows you to drive a car (optional free asset) on a pre-sized road.  While driving the next layer of obstacles keeps generating until game ends (game restarts).

Tested with a different group sizes (5 and 9) and different audiences (from computer science teachers to elementary school teachers). Roughly 3 h creation for absolute beginners and a group size of 5. Only received positive feedback.
